data.name: Nukepath
data.detailed_description: Nukepath is a post-apocaliptic action roguelike, where a survivor must get out of town before a nuclear bomb explodes everything. Dive across tons of enemies trying to kill you and shoot your way to the exit. Collect bolts and spend them on the shop to buy upgrades and get even stronger. Fight against ruthless bosses and discover multiple endings during your adventure.
data.about_the_game: Nukepath is a post-apocaliptic action roguelike, where a survivor must get out of town before a nuclear bomb explodes everything. Dive across tons of enemies trying to kill you and shoot your way to the exit. Collect bolts and spend them on the shop to buy upgrades and get even stronger. Fight against ruthless bosses and discover multiple endings during your adventure.
data.short_description: Nukepath is a post-apocaliptic action roguelike, where a survivor must get out of town before a nuclear bomb explodes everything.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 or better
  • Processor: 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia Gallium 0.4 NV 106 or better, OpenGL compatible
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: These requirements are not final, it can be subject to change.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 8 or better
  • Processor: 3.2 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 710 or better, OpenGL compatible
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: These requirements are not final, it can be subject to change.
